meanings.sent1: The unenlightened man had never learned to read.
meanings.sent2: She felt unenlightened about the topic and wanted to learn more.
meanings.sent4: His unenlightened view of the world kept him from seeing its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The unenlightened villagers believed in superstitions and myths.

meanings.sent1: The unenlightened child struggled with basic math concepts.
meanings.sent2: Feeling unenlightened, she decided to ask for help from a teacher.
meanings.sent3: The unenlightened tourist got lost in the city and couldn't find his way back.
meanings.sent4: His unenlightened approach to the problem led to many mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The unenlightened employee made errors due to a lack of training.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of awareness or insight
meanings.sent1: Her unenlightened comments offended many people.
meanings.sent2: The unenlightened driver failed to see the stop sign.
meanings.sent3: In an unenlightened moment, he accidentally wore mismatched shoes to work.
meanings.sent4: The unenlightened decision led to unintended consequences.
meanings.sent5: The unenlightened customer complained without understanding the situation.
